titleStmt.title: The humble answer of the House of Peers to His Majesties gracious lettter and declaration. Die Mercurii, 23⁰ Maii, 1660. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that the humble answer of the House of Peers to His Majesties most gracious letter and declaration be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Browne Cleric, Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Macock, and Francis Tyton, printers to the House of Lords,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf contains a woodcut of the royal arms on the verso.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
